result.translation: When there comes Allah’s help and the conquest[1],

result.arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
result.translation: and you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,

result.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
result.translation: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
